name: Rugrats: Castle Capers
description: Rugrats: Castle Capers is a single-player action game only for the Game Boy Advance, based on the Rugrats cartoon series. The story revolves around the Rugrats, who must retrieve their toys from Angelica after she steals them, imagining herself to be queen of a newly constructed playground set. Gameplay is very similar to the gameplay of Rugrats: Royal Ransom, released a year later.
